hooks.command: node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{try{const i=JSON.parse(d);const p=i.tool_input?.file_path||'';const block=(p.endsWith('.md')||p.endsWith('.txt'))&&!/(README|CLAUDE|AGENTS|CONTRIBUTING)\.md$/.test(p)&&!/\.claude\/plans\//.test(p)&&!/[一-龥]/.test(p);if(block){console.error('[Hook] BLOCKED: Unnecessary documentation file creation');console.error('[Hook] File: '+p);console.error('[Hook] Use README.md for documentation instead');process.exit(2)}}catch{}console.log(d)})"

PreToolUse.description: Block English .md files, but allow Chinese-named docs (per coding-style.md)
